page.title: 07Gt.Bromley:Likes + Dislikes.
page.content: In our survey,we asked what people liked about living here.The most common likes were:open space;the pretty{countryside}and the peace and quiet.Others commented on the {friendliness}and strong community feeling and easy access to major towns. We also asked what people disliked most about living in the area.The commonest{grumbles}were:lack of local facilities,especially shops;the lack of entertainment(mainly for youngsters)and the{poor public} {transport}.Some felt the village was rather isolated in winter and a few remarked on the lack of privacy. People obviously appreciate the benefits of living in the countryside but don't want to lose the facilities of the town.
